textBeforeTable: Jacket Regular Sizing: Dainese Men's Jacket Sizing: Gloves: Using a flexible measuring tape, measure around your hand, behind the knuckles, not including the thumb. Outseam: from waist to big ankle bone Inseam: from crotch to big ankle bone Hips: pelvic bone to pelvic bone, the widest part of your hips below the waist Waist: Measure at the hourglass of your torso, (circumference measured at your belly button) Chest: Measure from under/top of armpit across chest to under/top of other armpit, then across back to first armpit We highly recommend finding a cloth tape measure and taking the time to take these measurements. Dainese sizes will not necessarily correlate with fitment in other brands.
